JonSnow.name: Jon Snow
JonSnow.comment: We sure didn't expect that! Who can save the North now?

DaenerysTargaryen.name: Daenerys Targaryen
DaenerysTargaryen.comment: What a shocker! Looks like she wasn't the prince or princess who was promised after all...

Bronn.name: Bronn
Bronn.comment: We expected this to happen, as he was the character with the highest PLOD.

SansaStark.name: Sansa Stark
SansaStark.comment: Our algorithm didn't think that Sansa would survive this season either.

AryaStark.name: Arya Stark
AryaStark.comment: Her fate could've gone either way, so seeing Arya's story end was very suspenseful.

GregorClegane.name: Gregor Clegane
GregorClegane.comment: Another one of our 'favourites' for the death list! Gregor Clegane didn't last long.

BrienneOfTarth.name: Brienne of Tarth
BrienneOfTarth.comment: Another one of our 'favourites' for the death list! Gregor Clegane didn't last long.

TheonGreyjoy.name: Theon Greyjoy
TheonGreyjoy.comment: Another one of our 'favourites' for the death list! Gregor Clegane didn't last long.
